00059      MESQUITE_EXPORT AveragingQM( QualityMetric::AveragingMethod method ) :
00060        avgMethod(method)
00061      {}
00062

00064      
00066      MESQUITE_EXPORT inline 
00067      void set_averaging_method( QualityMetric::AveragingMethod method )
00068       { avgMethod = method; }
00069       
00070      MESQUITE_EXPORT inline
00071      void set_averaging_method( QualityMetric::AveragingMethod method, MsqError& )
00072       { set_averaging_method(method); }
00073     
00074      MESQUITE_EXPORT inline 
00075      QualityMetric::AveragingMethod get_averaging_method() const
00076       { return avgMethod; }
00077      
00080      inline bool analytical_average_gradient() 
00081       { return avgMethod <= QualityMetric::LAST_WITH_GRADIENT; }
00082 
00085      inline bool analytical_average_hessian() 
00086       { return avgMethod <= QualityMetric::LAST_WITH_HESSIAN; }
